heading_level.description: The initial heading level to use.
heading_level.markdownDescription:
[DOCUMENTATION](https://mkdocstrings.github.io/shell/configuration/#heading_level)

The initial heading level to use.
heading_level.title: heading_level

show_root_heading.description:
Show the heading of the object at the root of the documentation tree.

The root object is the object referenced by the identifier after `:::`.
show_root_heading.markdownDescription:
[DOCUMENTATION](https://mkdocstrings.github.io/shell/configuration/#show_root_heading)

Show the heading of the object at the root of the documentation tree.

The root object is the object referenced by the identifier after `:::`.
show_root_heading.title: show_root_heading

show_root_toc_entry.description: If the root heading is not shown, at least add a ToC entry for it.
show_root_toc_entry.markdownDescription:
[DOCUMENTATION](https://mkdocstrings.github.io/shell/configuration/#show_root_toc_entry)

If the root heading is not shown, at least add a ToC entry for it.
show_root_toc_entry.title: show_root_toc_entry
